Text.Value: But if we are to succeed, we will need others.
But if we are to succeed, we will need others.
Baldur's Gate may not know it yet, but its fate is bound to ours.
Baldur's Gate may not know it yet, but its fate is bound to ours.
I'll think about it.
You are impressive, it is true. But do not forget that I protected you. You were not alone.
You are impressive, it is true. But do not forget that I protected you. You were not alone.
We leave the heart of the Absolute, alive, thanks to you.
We leave the heart of the Absolute, alive, thanks to you.
Minthara would have been a bitter foe, but by your side and with her mind her own, she will make a remarkable ally.
Minthara would have been a bitter foe, but by your side and with her mind her own, she will make a remarkable ally.
Especially now that she is motivated by the loss of the one she loved.
Especially now that she is motivated by the loss of the one she loved.
I may be the one who protects you, but it is you who must champion the cause.
I may be the one who protects you, but it is you who must champion the cause.
Halsin's strength and loyalty will bolster you in times of need.
Halsin's strength and loyalty will bolster you in times of need.
Very well. Since you insist, the fate of Baldur's Gate and the world entire must hang upon your conviction.
Very well. Since you insist, the fate of Baldur's Gate and the world entire must hang upon your conviction.
Will there be anyone left when we arrive in the city?
There are many more battles ahead, and they will not be so easily won. You will need allies.
There are many more battles ahead, and they will not be so easily won. You will need allies.
Together, we will put an end to the Absolute, the Chosen, all.
Together, we will put an end to the Absolute, the Chosen, all.
I'm worried about what I might do to my allies...
Did you not see what I just did? I don't need anyone.
You have the makings of a leader. I believe you could inspire others to join our cause.
You have the makings of a leader. I believe you could inspire others to join our cause.

EditorData.logicalname: Didnt recruit anyone in throne room

Text.Value: And you are the one who could prevent it.
And you are the one who could prevent it.
I will seek more allies in the city.
I already have allies.
Whatever you might do to one cannot be worse than what the Chosen will unleash on all.
Whatever you might do to one cannot be worse than what the Chosen will unleash on all.
But if you change your mind...
But if you change your mind...
I know. That's why I just recruited Halsin.
No. We are enough as we are.
You have the makings of a leader. Your actions have already inspired those around you.
You have the makings of a leader. Your actions have already inspired those around you.

EditorData.logicalname: Spoke to allies in throne room

Text.Value: Jaheira's wisdom will be an asset to you on the journey ahead. Her Harpers, too.
Jaheira's wisdom will be an asset to you on the journey ahead. Her Harpers, too.
You did well to defeat Ketheric. But Ketheric was only the first to fall.
You did well to defeat Ketheric. But Ketheric was only the first to fall.
Enough lives have been lost. I don't want to send others to their deaths.
Seek on its streets those whose purpose aligns with our own, and invite them to our cause.
Seek on its streets those whose purpose aligns with our own, and invite them to our cause.
I will build an army to rival that of the Absolute!
Good. I am glad to hear that.
Good. I am glad to hear that.
I know. That's why I just recruited Minthara.
I don't need allies, I have you.
Especially now that she is reunited with her love.
Especially now that she is reunited with her love.
If Nightsong's fury against Ketheric runs as deep as it seems, she will make a fierce ally indeed.
If Nightsong's fury against Ketheric runs as deep as it seems, she will make a fierce ally indeed.
And if they died, would their deaths not count? But they need not die, for they would have you.
And if they died, would their deaths not count? But they need not die, for they would have you.
Even if the buildings are demolished, there are always survivors. There are always those who will fight.
Even if the buildings are demolished, there are always survivors. There are always those who will fight.
I know. That's why I just recruited Jaheira.

Synopsis: Daisy sets you on the mission to gather allies upon trying to leave SCE. Entire dialogue is telepathic (Daisy does not show up in the world.)
